ValidationRule.description: Give an error message if user try to create a meeting outside of timeline and work trail
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CASE(IPS_Type__c, "Meeting with Employer", 1, "Meeting with Participant", 1, "Start up meeting", 1, "First Meeting with Employer", 1, "Arbeidsgivermøte", 1, 0 )=1, IPS_isFromTimeline__c = false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Møter fra kalenderen kan ikke opprettes
